          <title>
            <string language="en">Isomers of pentanol: molecular model for 3-methylbutan-2-ol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Isomere des Pentanols: molekulares Modell 
für 3-methylbutan-2-ol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Isomères de pentanol : modèle 
moléculaire pour 3-methylbutan-2-ol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Isomers do pentanol: modelo molecular para 
3-methylbutan-2-ol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Isomeri di pentanolo: modello molecolare per
3-methylbutan-2-ol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ισομερή pentanol: μοριακό μοντέλο για 
3-μετχυλψuταν-2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Isómeros del pentanol: modelo molecular 
para 3-methylbutan-2-ol</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Fifth of six illustrations showing the ball-and-stick models for the isomers of pentanol. This is the molecular model for 3-methylbutan-2-ol.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>

          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fünftel von sechs Abbildungen, welche die 
Kugel-und-Stock Modelle für die Isomere des Pentanols zeigen. 
Dieses ist das molekulare Modell für 3-methylbutan-2-ol.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cinquième de six illustrations montrant les 
modèles de boule-et-bâton pour les isomères du pentanol. 
C'est le modèle moléculaire pour 3-methylbutan-2-ol.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fifth de seis ilustrações que mostram os modelos
da esfera-e-vara para os isomers do pentanol. Este é o modelo 
molecular para 3-methylbutan-2-ol.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un fifth di sei illustrazioni che mostrano i 
modelli del sfera-e-bastone per gli isomeri di pentanolo. Ciò 
è il modello molecolare per 3-methylbutan-2-ol.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πέμπτη έξι απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν μοντέλα 
σφαίρα-και-ραβδιών για τα ισομερή pentanol. Αυτό είναι 
το μοριακό μοντέλο για 3-μετχυλψuταν-2.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fifth de seis ilustraciones que muestran los 
modelos del bola-y-palillo para los isómeros del pentanol. 
Éste es el modelo molecular para 3-methylbutan-2-ol.</string>
          </description>
